node.title: Outsourcing in Clinical Trials Europe
node.content:
Are you planning to be at OCT Europe?

Let's meet!

CROMSOURCE is an international contract research organisation providing comprehensive services to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology and medical device industries. Specialising in clinical development and resourcing solutions, we offer a flexible approach to ensure our clients’ unique needs are supported. CROMSOURCE is unparalleled in offering an end-to-end guarantee covering trial timelines, enrolment, and price. CROMSOURCE operates offices across Europe and North America.

Our Speakers

It is well-known within the pharma and medical device industry that a significant proportion of clinical trials fail due to challenges with sites selection and patient recruitment & retention. Those two critical aspects will be discussed by our experts on May, 15 at 9:30.

Title: Disrupting Project Planning to Maximise Patient Engagement and Motivation Main topics: • Underlining the importance of customising your approach to patient recruitment and retention • Utilising investigators to develop patient-friendly protocols and develop effective informed consent documents • Developing a comprehensive internationalisation plan with continued education and enhanced patient commitment • Emphasising flexibility with difficult-to-recruit populations

Our experts will guide you through the clinical product development process, providing you with the support you need, with complete consulting and clinical services, including regulatory, and medical affairs. Through our TalentSource Life Sciences Department, we also offer a full range of flexible staffing options, from full FSP to individual insourcing/staff augmentation.

Schedule an Appointment

node.title: Webinar: “Disrupting Project Planning to Maximize Patient Engagement and Motivation”
node.content: Join us for a webinar on November 12 at 12:00 PM EST to learn real world examples about how to keep patients engaged and motivated during a clinical trial. Our experts, Kerry Dyson, Global Head, Clinical Research Division, and Kris O’Brien, Vice President, Client Strategy and Development, will discuss ways to boost patient enrollment and engagement. Sign up today!
